titleStmt.title: An exposition of the holy ornaments and ceremonies which the Church uses at Mass Collected from several authors. And now publish'd for the common good of all Catholicks, and others.
An exposition of the holy ornaments and ceremonies which the Church uses at Mass Collected from several authors. And now publish'd for the common good of all Catholicks, and others.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The ornaments and ceremonies us'd at Mass.
Includes: The method of saying the rosary of Our Blessed Lady, sixteenth edition, with separate pagination and register. This item cataloged separately at reel 1973:13.
With advertisements at the bottom of p. 22, first sequence, and on pp. 2-4 of the second sequence.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
